item.title: All your mainstream UI frameworks are lying to you
item.description: What a lovely title to start an article. But don’t get me wrong â€” this is not a clickbait. And yes, I’m going to name-drop some technologies and names here and there. Not to tarnish their reputation, but to better reveal a thought that has haunted me for a long time. In addition, this article is not a marketing one and is not intended to promote some other magic pill.
